summary: Implement new 'Safe-Landing' algorithm based on Gyro-Failsafe v2.1
description: The current landing sequence is too aggressive in windy conditions. Integrate the new v2.1 algorithm from the 'Flight-Core' repo for a smoother 3-point landing in crosswinds >15 kph. This is a primary customer request.

comments.author: John Smith
comments.body: Initial integration branch pushed. Note: requires update to the 'telemetry-parser' config to properly ingest the new wind shear variables.

comments.author: Sarah Connor
comments.body: Testing complete. The **key change was capping the descent rate at 0.5m/s** when the Gyro-Z reading exceeded a 5-degree threshold. Closing ticket.

summary: BUG: Motors occasionally stutter at 75% throttle during long flights
description: Observed in 4 separate flight logs. Power output briefly dips (1-2 seconds) when throttle is held at sustained 75% for over 5 minutes. Suspected thermal or voltage regulation issue.

comments.author: Sarah Connor
comments.body: Hardware analysis complete. The issue is confirmed to be voltage drop on the PDB rail under sustained load. **Decision:** We are switching the main capacitor from 1000uF to a **1500uF low-ESR variant** for all future units (Batch 3+).

comments.author: John Smith
comments.body: Acknowledged. Updating BOM and notifying manufacturing. Marking as 'In Progress' until change is confirmed in production.

summary: Investigate compatibility with new 'GoPro 13' camera model API
description: New camera model released. Need to verify our on-drone telemetry overlay and remote camera control features still function correctly via the new v3 Camera API endpoints. This is a future compatibility task.

summary: Re-evaluate motor overheating threshold (firmware 1.8.2)
description: With new high-temp stator insulation, the current 70°C warning is too conservative and triggers unnecessary landings. Propose a new threshold.

comments.author: John Smith
comments.body: Testing with new insulation shows peak sustained temps of 72°C are safe. **Final Decision:** Increasing the firmware warning threshold to **75°C**.

summary: Document new 'Power-Saving' mode activation sequence
description: The activation sequence changed in v1.8.2 to prevent accidental activation. Update all user manuals and internal SOPs.

comments.author: Ethan Hunt
comments.body: Updated all documentation. The new sequence is: **Throttle Down > Mode Switch 3 > Wait 5s**. Uploaded the final PDF to Drive.

summary: Feature: Add geo-fencing capability for Europe market compliance
description: Must implement EU regulatory zone logic to prevent flight in restricted areas. Requires new map data ingestion module.

summary: BUG: GPS Lock loss in urban canyons (Regression v1.7.5)
description: GPS module disconnects briefly when signal quality drops below 30%. Started happening after a recent power management board revision.

comments.author: Ben Kim
comments.body: Root cause was insufficient power to the GPS unit during high current draw. **Fix:** Increased GPS power output from **3.3V to 3.5V** via a hardware jumper modification on the next batch PDBs.

summary: Refactor 'Flight-Core' telemetry module to use Protobuf over JSON
description: Migrate data serialization from bulky JSON to efficient Protobuf for a 40% reduction in transmission size and latency.

comments.author: Alex Chen
comments.body: Migration complete. Pull Request #302 is ready for review. Focusing primarily on the `sensor_data` schema.

summary: Investigate 404 error on new firmware update server
description: Clients cannot download the v1.9.0 firmware. Server responds with 404 Not Found.

comments.author: Chloe Davis
comments.body: Root cause identified: The new **S3 bucket was configured without public read access**, and the CDN cache wasn't cleared after deployment. Fixed both issues.

summary: Create test plan for waterproof casing validation (IPX8)
description: Need a formal test plan defining pressure, submersion time, and temperature ranges for the IPX8 rating.

comments.author: Ethan Hunt
comments.body: Test plan complete. Key criteria: **Submersion at 2 meters for 60 minutes**, no ingress allowed. Test document linked.

summary: R&D: Integrate LiDAR sensor for future obstacle avoidance module
description: Evaluate the new Velodyne Puck LITE LiDAR for size, power consumption, and data rate suitability for our next-gen drone.

summary: BUG: Companion app crashes on iOS 17 beta during RTH sequence
description: App crashes specifically when the 'Return to Home' (RTH) command is initiated. Only on iOS 17 beta devices.

comments.author: Chloe Davis
comments.body: Found a lifecycle bug in an external library. **Fix:** Updated dependency `react-native-os-util` to version **1.4.2** (latest patch). Build `1.9.1-P` is ready for QA.

summary: Update drone maintenance schedule documentation
description: Revise the gimbal lubrication frequency from 100 hours to 75 hours of flight time.

comments.author: Ethan Hunt
comments.body: Documentation revised and uploaded to the 'SOP' folder in Google Drive. **Key change:** Gimbal lubrication every **75 flight hours**.

summary: New Requirement: Add custom PID tuning via web interface
description: Allow advanced users to configure Proportional, Integral, and Derivative (PID) flight control parameters via the local web interface.

summary: Regression: Altitude hold drifts after 10 minutes
description: The drone gradually loses or gains altitude over time when the 'Altitude Hold' mode is engaged. Only occurs after the drone has been airborne for >10 minutes.

comments.author: Sarah Connor
comments.body: Initial investigation points to a **pressure sensor calibration drift** due to internal temperature changes. Looking into a dynamic temperature compensation solution in the firmware.

summary: Setup CI/CD pipeline for firmware patch releases
description: Automate the build, testing, and signing process for all minor firmware updates (e.g., v1.9.x) using Jenkins.

comments.author: Chloe Davis
comments.body: Jenkins pipeline configured and tested. Jobs are now triggered by a Git tag push. Automated signing uses the **`release-key-v2`** environment variable.

summary: Documentation: Guide for flashing new ESC firmware
description: Create a clear guide for flashing the Electronic Speed Controller (ESC) firmware from v5.0 to v5.1 using the BLHeliSuite software.

comments.author: Ethan Hunt
comments.body: Step-by-step guide is live on the internal wiki under the 'Flashing Procedures' section. Crucial step: **Bridge pads 3 & 4 on the board** before connecting the programmer.

summary: BUG: Radio signal drops intermittently past 1km range
description: Customers report signal loss at ranges where v1 hardware performed perfectly. This is a critical safety issue.

comments.author: John Smith
comments.body: Confirmed this is a new interference pattern caused by the camera shielding. **Blocked by hardware team** on antenna placement redesign (see related ticket **HW-301**).

summary: User Story: Drone returns to home on low battery
description: The drone should automatically trigger Return to Home (RTH) when the battery level is critically low, ensuring safe recovery.

comments.author: Sarah Connor
comments.body: Feature implemented and tested. The RTH trigger is now set to **15% battery level**. This value gives us a 95% confidence rate for a safe 2km return in standard conditions.

summary: Re-evaluate cloud logging costs for Q4
description: Analyze log volume, retention policy, and sampling rates to reduce cloud logging expenditure for the next quarter.

summary: Feature: Support for custom flight paths (waypoint system)
description: Implement a waypoint system that allows pre-programming of autonomous flight missions through the companion app.

comments.author: Ben Kim
comments.body: Waypoint logic implementation complete. PR #310 is ready. I used the **Bresenham's line algorithm** for path discretization to ensure smooth transitions.

summary: Security: Run static analysis on new comms module
description: Perform a security review of the new encrypted communication module (v3) before deployment.

comments.author: Alex Chen
comments.body: Static analysis passed. **No critical buffer overflow or injection vulnerabilities found** in the C++ comms module.

summary: Refactor: Update telemetry parser to handle dynamic sensor payloads
description: The current parser is hard-coded for 8 sensors. With R&D adding LiDAR (DRZ-462), we need a flexible payload parser that can adapt to different sensor counts.
